title: Wind SFX (Client)
body: Why is there a wind sound tied to SFX in the client? I disabled all other sounds because I only want to know when I get an invite from a friend, when queue has popped, or when to ban, not to hear annoying wind over everything else I'm doing on the side. Please give me a way to disable this sound without editing the game files!

replies.body: I don't hear anything.  o_o  Are you sure this is League?

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=wAWqUT0i,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-05-13T18:39:20.489+0000)
>
> I don't hair anything.  o_o  Are you sure this is League?

When you are in lobby before or during queue.

It's interesting that this is happening even with disabled sounds.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech guys can listen in with you.  We'll reply back asap and see what we can do as soon as we can.

Will do, but I did make a video for reference.
https://youtu.be/xtv2SbbSdgY

This is great, thanks for the video!  You should be able to disable the ambient noises while in the SR lobby by muting SFX.  This was the same bar you used to increase the sound.  Muting the SFX there should not impact your in-game experience.  I hope that helps!
But that would mute the sounds that I want to hear;  queue pop/ban time/other invites

That's fair.  In this case, my suggestion for you would be to let your voice be heard and share your feedback to the client devs at our [client discussion boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion).  Since this doesn't appear to be a bug but more a suggestion, let them know how you feel about adding an option specifically for muting lobbies.  Good luck!

Will do. I got the same result from LudusBonus on the support team. Here's my new post:
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion/MU9iZYFa-wind-sfx-client
